title: Retirement Advisor: How FAs Can Fix The Retirement Crisis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The retirement crisis, at its core, is an all-too-human succumbing to our desire for satisfaction in the present at the expense of our futures. This podcast (5:21) proposes a simple exercise that financial advisors – a profession whose value is frequently publicly questioned – have the unique ability to conduct, thereby providing tremendous value for their clients. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
